page.title: 19GIRL GUIDES
page.content: Our pack of Guides is called first Landford.The clothing you wear is navy skirt, light blue shirt, navy hat and dark blue tie.In Guides you have a word called enrolment it is when you get an enrolment trefoil,when you become a member of the pack.There are three trefoil badges.The colours are green,red and yellow and the Lord Baden Powell trefoil.The first trefoil you get is the yellow one the second one is the green on the third one the red and then the Lord Baden Powell trefoil.Guides have a promise which we have to learn for our enrolment it is I promise that I will do my best to do my duty to god to serve the Queen and help other people and to keep the Guide law.
